name: Saffr'Activ®
description: Saffr'Activ® is saffron extract entirely made in France and with a patent pending. Saffr’Activ® is a pure, natural ingredient, obtained exclusively from the best parts of Crocus sativus red stigmas and used to improve sleep. Rich in many active compounds, Saffr’Activ® is standardized in crocins 3% minimum, guaranteed by strict UV and HPLC detection analyzes and in safranal 2% (by UV). This ingredient is certified without adulterations and especially designed to provide our customers efficacy, safety and full traceability. Saffr’Activ® does not contain any GMO, allergens, pesticides or heavy metals. Through a clinical study made in 2014, GPE notably demonstrated Saffr’Activ® efficiency to induce a restorative sleep.
